locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ This place is clean and has all the facilities for truckers and travelers. Shower room is clean and faucets have great water pressure. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and the place has been completely remodeled. I am completely unimpressed. Shower was dirty, radio shack is dead, there's no restaurant anymore just fast food, and the driver's TV lounge is an absolute joke. At least 1/3 of the truck lot ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the bathrooms, except for the family bathroom, to which they have 2. Upstairs there are the showers, laundry machines, small game room and some massage chairs. The family bathrooms are usually clean, although there was an occasion or two ‚Ä¶

I love stopping by here to get a shower. While I was just there, I had chose  not to do a final check before I left the shower and had forgot my scale that I travel with. Well, the gentleman there chased me down to return it. I had made it ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to roll in late and know we would find parking even though we did have to pay.  Food choices limited especially rolling in late. My biggest problem, paying for a shower with no AC it was way too hot in there, but cleanliness was excellent.

‚Ä¶ bit yucky & in need of toilet seat covers. Hand soap dispensers were pretty much all empty in the ladies room. Shower rooms smelled like they weren‚Äôt cleaned in months; an odor like feces & urine. My shower stall had a roach in there & the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ love when my husband stop here for the night. This facility is very clean and kept up . The best place to shower you can smell the clean in the air. When you go in the shower room you can tell they clean it very well you can see the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Professional drivers have access to their shower and laundry facilities far and away from the common areas which in turn gives families passing through the comfort they need to dine separately while barely crossing paths with the other.  T ‚Ä¶

If you want to pass out from the smell of bleach in the showers, shower here. Not sure why they can't use a different type of sanitizer in the showers. Toilet water wasn't even clear. Looked almost like the water in Flint. Also there was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ TA truckstop in the middle of the mountains of South Central Pennsylvania. This place has all the amenities, but it will cost you (reserved parking $18) ( shower $14). Lots of easy parking, clean hot showers, arcade, fitness room, theater, ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Made my drop and with two hours left in my clock, I stopped for a bite to eat, a shower, and to shut down for the night. Extremely disgusting and disappointing. There is no reason, whatsoever, that the showers should be as filthy as they ‚Ä¶

I stopped in today to get a shower and once I walked inside it hasn‚Äôt even been cleaned, whipped down, the trash was still in the trash can, I have pictures. So once  I brought my issue to a team member all he did was switch out the towels ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ helps. The store is clean and well stocked. The waiting list for showers was a little long, yet the staff were quick to clean the shower rooms as they became available. Truck parking was decent at 6 pm, nothing crazy. Clean parking ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ for a plumbing issue or something that I assume started on yesterday idk. There are truckers & customers that can't make certain purchases, use the restroom or shower. But the McDonald that is adjoined is still in serviceüôÑ. Like how are ‚Ä¶

Clean shower. Clean bathrooms. Subway was one of the best Subways I've been too in awhile. It was cleaner than most. All of a sudden there was a line then all of a sudden there were four employees ready to work. No waiting for 10 minutes ‚Ä¶
Still waiting for a shower ... got 3 empty no one is cleaning. I been waiting 45 mins

‚Ä¶ I've been here the employees have been friendly and the bathrooms are very clean. In addition to food and drink, there's a nice selection of snacks, gifts and necessities. We were there last week and I learned that you can get a shower too!
This is a nice loves. Parked at 2 pm and showered, shower was clean and had good water pressure with hot water. The parking lot was quiet all night.
Very clean shower, Two towels! Greeted at the door by nice employees. Bathroom was also clean. A good amount of truck parking, some easy spots to get into if your Early enough. Nice!

Just keep an eye on shower restrooms. The cleaning here is not very thoroughly. I‚Äôve seen these guys clean, and they use own towel on floor to wipe the floor real quick. And if it looks clean, that‚Äôs how they leave it.  And toilets are not ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Clean showers, 4 washers, 6 dryers, and great restaurant walking distance sultan kabob Hidden gem! Looks closed from outside but super cozy on the inside. Welcoming staff! Delicious food huge portions.
jerusalem tea & Turkish coffee are on point.

Legit pullthru charging!!!
Clean bathrooms, huge seating area to hang out while charging, selection of fast food or ready-to-go stuff from the convenience store
Nice to charge with a place to sit that isnt my truck!

Only restaurant open was Arbys on a Wednesday  night 830.Then you got the nerve to charge $20 to park when half your facilities  are closed.
For this company  to supposedly  be CHRISTIAN  based,yall sure bend drivers over and stick ot to them with parking.
DO BETTER

I haven't been here in years and the place has been completely remodeled. I am completely unimpressed. Shower was dirty, radio shack is dead, there's no restaurant anymore just fast food, and the driver's TV lounge is an absolute joke. At least 1/3 of the truck lot is reserved only. Nothing here to ever get me to come back again.

One of the nicest and cleanest TA's I've seen around the country. It's a wonderful truck stop. 4 stars because of the young Asian looking cashiers that give some wild looks to customers and basically have no any customer service etiquette and basically create a little discomfort. But that's understandable.

showerReviews.reviewText:
üöö Trucker here.
Newly renovated. Clean & organized. Huge shower rooms with great water pressure. Cheap laundry ($2.75/load). And the usual drivers‚Äô lounge.
So yeah, no complaints here! üòÄ ‚Ä¶

Today 9/15/25 is my third time here within the last 1.5 year and this place showers are not working. It‚Äôs the only flying j in the area and u would think that with the fuel prices they could keep the showers running. I would call first b4 coming here bc this is unacceptable

I stopped by here to fuel up and a couple of the fuel isles had one pump working. There was line to get fuel because of pumps being down. The inside looks okay but it's small and they also have a Denny's attached to the store for your convenience. The showers are not bad also!

Parking is good. It's nice and quiet. No congestion for trucker's. Ladies restrooms are up to par. Store is kept nice and clean. There's a Denny's restaurant also. Hot food's are available. Friendly staff. I only ask that next time the hash browns are warm and soft üòâüòÅ. ‚Ä¶

PA is absolutely beautiful! Thank You! 145 truck parking, 36 reserved (get yours online). RV parking up front.  Home style meals (meatloaf, chicken etc.) Denny's. Hot showers and electronic gaming.  "Be a Beacon of light so others can find their way. Safe and happy travels".

Waiting for a hr for a shower while manager and employee outside smoking cigarettes empty dirty showers no one cleaning them and 6 ppl waiting.store is dirty coffe empty. Poor manager skills she sits in her car smoking cigarettes.this dump ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Easy to get to, cashier was friendly. I only stopped for a shower, but was told they hadn't been cleaned yet. I insisted that I wasn't picky, so they let me take one anyways.
Food is OK was much better before bfs had it  just don't stop for a shower they don't have any towels and would charge the same if you use your own

A good note for truck drivers !
Not anymore shower at this time , do know for how long .
Place is nasty and dirty! And they don't even want to fix their shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean shower and very good customer serviceüëèüëçüèº ‚Ä¶

On the road trucking with my husband & stopped here 2 days in a row on route. The 1st day the wait for showers was long & we ended up with a freezing cold shower ü•∂.  The lady did refund. The fountain drink machines (2) were both completely ‚Ä¶

I‚Äôm on a road trip cross country, I stoped to get gas and shower after not showering for 5 day. They said the showered were down for no hot water‚Ä¶. There was hot water when I washed my hands in the bathroom. He said he couldn‚Äôt promise the ‚Ä¶

Excellent Place to revitalized yourself... Pleasant. Environment, Kind , Helpful Staff, Lounge w/ TV , Wash Clothes , Take a Shower & Be Completely Happy... Connected to a ,"Arbys"... Plus U can gas up any size vehicle,( car, motorcycle, to ‚Ä¶

Stopped for a shower. After purchasing shower realized water was turned off.  No notice or anything.  Why staff did not put up a notice or some form of communication is beyond me.  Lazy?  Or stupid?  Or both.  Never stop here again.
Usually has decent price on fuel, clean restrooms and  Arbys restaurant, trucker's can get  their basic supplies and a hot shower. This location even has cinnabon.

Bad service dirty bathroom I waited so long for a shower no line I got timed out as the employees ignored me as I'm next in line timed out The chick with Coke bottle glasses was listening to music and fraternizing with other coworkers not ‚Ä¶
The people who work there are very nice and friendly. The store is clean, they keep up with the shower cleaning. It was a good stop.
The auto shower from the app messed up. But what a junky store. All kinds of traps to walk back to a shower. Bags of trash left everywhere. Must be worst pilot I've been to
Much better than most of other truck stops, quality of fuel good and shower plus laundry...

showerReviews.reviewText:
Service above and beyond. I love this place!
Almost forgot. The front desk was over the top accommodating. Raven helped me a last minute reservation, and not knowing we'd need it, provided a shower chair for my friend. Like I said, I love this place.

Very clean and modern. An excellent experience. The breakfast was outstanding, Robin provided super attention to detail to maintaining the buffets' cleanliness and organization, making it a truly delicious breakfast. Far better than the ‚Ä¶

We were very impressed with this hotel‚Ä¶ Everyone was very friendly. We were especially impressed with the Breakfast.. extremely clean, had all the little extra Condiments, And very helpful staff.. Thank you so much for the good experience..

Stopped here for one night on our cross country trip. The room was clean, but extremely dated. The bed was very comfortable, though and that was what was most important! The bathroom shower had excessive mold in the corners. There is not ‚Ä¶

Breezewood is literally just a place to sleep for the night, there's not much to do in town. However, that being said, this hotel was very nice, clean, and had extremely friendly and accommodating staff. Enjoyed my stay!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ least the staff working on 6/26 we‚Äôre all pleasant to interact with , the lot has some holes that could be patched the showers were very small and as someone tall over 6‚Äô3 I  had to bend my head to keep from smacking the roof of the shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ need to stop supporting nasty businesses like this one. The lot is full of large craters and holes.  charging $10 for a disgusting shower y‚Äôall oughta be ashamed of yourselves !!  If yall showers look like this I can only imagine ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ The building is a bit old, and the showers look rough, $7 for a shower. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The reason I only gave 1 star is the overnight fuel desk attendant. She couldn't be bothered to get off her phone, or her fat a$$, long enough to get towels for a shower. Yeah, I walked upstairs and checked. Maybe they need to get more ‚Ä¶

Love these old mom and pop truck stops that haven't gone down hill since the big chains started. Very good place to stop shower and eat. Rest rooms were clean and same with the showers. Had a pizza was awesome. All of the staff was very ‚Ä¶

Good place, mostly paved parking but does have a few noon crater potholes,. Shower 7 bucks, water gets hot but run it as soon as you walk in shower room at least for Shower #7 anyways as takes like 15 minutes but does get hot just have to ‚Ä¶

Huge parking lot, good food, 7 dollar clean hot shower.  Not bad at all, even items in the store where priced lower than other truck stops.  Knocked off a star because there was only one guy running the restaurant, handling the money and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of parking at 10pm.  The Pit Stop Cafe is very good, pizza, salad, sandwich menu, young gal behind the counter very nice even though she was the only one working.  Didn't use shower or fuel and no wifi but very quiet.  Will stop here again.
Grate staff, Amazingly hot shower all around good experience, with one exception PARKING LOT... Too small, too many pay to park spots. I'll be back  just need to get  there earlier  than 18:00.

‚Ä¶ My name is Aaron Sumpter and I‚Äôve been stopping here for fuel, food and a shower for years. Unfortunately, tonight will be the last time. After I finished my dinner I walked up to the fuel desk to get a shower. The young man behind the ‚Ä¶

Walk in to take a shower at 8:45pm and get told that the showers are closed. No reason why or nothing just the showers are closed. After driving all day all I wanted was a shower.

Shower are 10$  and never been  renovated

Not very impress

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has great potential, they offered hot meals, the shelves were stocked, they have 12 showers. They only had a few working fuel pumps with no DEF, but thankfully I did not need def. I stopped for diesel and a shower and this spot ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ While taking a finishing up a shower up a shower the guy cleaning the place was cleaning my shower while I was getting stuff out of it. He could have cleaned 2 other showers . ‚Ä¶
No shower and it‚Äôs not a pilot flying sens 6 months why you don‚Äôt update the info
Store is good. Restroom and shower was clean. Pressure and temperature of shower was limit. Such a shame to see a huge truck parking closed like that.. truck parking are so rare in PA comon Flying J.

‚Ä¶ It seems like they are setup more for 18 wheelers than four wheelers. I like that. The shower was clean. Even though it's in the basement it's set up pretty nice. I don't know what they were cooking when I came in but it smelled amazing. T ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ guys pulling in at 9pm and having to turn around so keep that in mind. The girl working at the register was welcoming, the old man cleaning the shower was also nice. The pond is also a nice touch. 3 stars because it was convenient for me
I found a place to park at 4pm.  Still saw others finding a spot until 5:30 on a Tuesday. I didn't fuel up here. Shower was hot. Restaurant was closed.
This place is a dump! You will get a free involuntary shower if  it is raining while fueling here! No DEF at the pump! Stop at the TA it is way better!

Quick shower, quick gas station style food, this Flying J is non Corporate, the staff is fairly friendly. The shower was clean. It‚Äôs an old private truck stop trying to keep their heads above water. The lot on the hill is $13 a night ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , lack of help. Huge parking lot closed because they have no lighting. But they do sell diesel and they have a large store. Skip the shower after taking a good look around. Your typical nasty Flying J that hasn't been renovated in years.
